Workflow

1. Get the data

```{r}
library(haven)
cars <- read_sas("http://www.principlesofeconometrics.com/sas/cars.sas7bdat", 
    NULL)
```


```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)

plot <- cars %>%
 filter(MPG >= 28L & MPG <= 47L) %>%
 ggplot() +
 aes(x = MPG, y = ENG) +
 geom_point(size = 1L, colour = "#0c4c8a") +
 theme_minimal()

ggplotly(plot)
```
